TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit MemberInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider, class System.Runtime.InteropServices._MemberInfo
Public MustInherit Class MemberInfo Implements _MemberInfo, ICustomAttributeProvider
type MemberInfo = class interface ICustomAttributeProvider interface _MemberInfo

summary.span: 取得成員的屬性相關資訊，並提供成員中繼資料的存取。

span.span: Obtains information about the attributes of a member and provides access to member metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象的基底類別，用來取得所有成員 （建構函式、 事件、 欄位、 方法和屬性） 之類別的相關資訊的類別。The class is the abstract base class for classes used to obtain information about all members of a class (constructors, events, fields, methods, and properties). 此類別會引入的所有成員都提供的基本功能。This class introduces the basic functionality that all members provide. ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用不同的反映類別來分析組件中包含的中繼資料。This example shows how to use various reflection classes to analyze the metadata contained in an assembly. [!code-cpp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CPP/reflection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CS/Reflection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/VB/Reflection.vb#1)]

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個類別無法繼承由部分信任的程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

span.span: This type is thread safe.

para.span: 當您繼承自您必須覆寫下列成員：和。

span.span: When you inherit from you must override the following members: and .

summary.span: 取得宣告這個成員的類別。

span.span: Gets the class that declares this member.

value.span: 宣告這個成員之類別的 物件。

span.span: The object for the class that declares this member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會擷取參考宣告這個成員的型別物件。The property retrieves a reference to the object for the type that declares this member. 類型的成員型別所宣告或繼承自基底型別，因此`Type`所傳回的物件屬性可能不會與相同`Type`物件，用來取得目前物件。A member of a type is either declared by the type or inherited from a base type, so the `Type` object returned by the property might not be the same as the `Type` object used to obtain the current object. - 如果`Type`物件，此`MemberInfo`取得物件沒有宣告這個成員，屬性會代表其基底型別。If the `Type` object from which this `MemberInfo` object was obtained did not declare this member, the property will represent one of its base types. - 如果`MemberInfo`物件是通用的成員 (亦即，如果它取自方法，以傳回模組上的全域方法)，傳回會`null`。If the `MemberInfo` object is a global member (that is, if it was obtained from the method, which returns global methods on a module), the returned will be `null`. ## Examples 下列範例會定義介面， `IValue`，具有單一成員， `GetValue`。The following example defines an interface, `IValue`, with a single member, `GetValue`. 它也會定義四個類別： `A`，實作的基底類別`IValue`介面;`B`，該項則繼承自`A`，並隱藏它的實作`GetValue`與基底類別實作;`C`，只要繼承自`A`; 並`D`，該項則繼承自`A`並覆寫其`GetValue`方法。It also defines four classes: `A`, a base class that implements the `IValue` interface; `B`, which inherits from `A` and hides its implementation of `GetValue` from the base class implementation; `C`, which simply inherits from `A`; and `D`, which inherits from `A` and overrides its `GetValue` method. 範例接著會擷取型別的各個成員的物件 (包括成員繼承自)，並顯示的值及其屬性。The example then retrieves a object for each member of the type (including members inherited from ) and displays the value of its property. [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.DeclaringType Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.DeclaringType Example/CS/Example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.DeclaringType Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.DeclaringType Example/VB/Example2.vb#2)] 請注意，宣告類型`A.GetValue`是`A`，、 該`B`包含兩個`GetValue`方法，來宣告對應到一個`A`，另一個經由`B`，和宣告類型的`D.GetValue`是`D`。Note that the declaring type of `A.GetValue` is `A`, that `B` includes two `GetValue` methods, one declared by `A` and one by `B`, and that the declaring type of `D.GetValue` is `D`. > [!NOTE] > `DeclaringType` 傳回只包含成員名稱和其宣告的型別名稱。`DeclaringType` returns only the member names and the names of their declaring types. 若要傳回的成員具有其原型的名稱，請呼叫`MemberInfo.ToString`。To return the member names with their prototypes, call `MemberInfo.ToString`.

Public MustOverride Function GetCustomAttributes (inherit As Boolean) As Object()
public: abstract cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ GetCustomAttributes(bool inherit);
abstract member GetCustomAttributes : bool -> obj[]

param.name: inherit
param.span: 表示要搜尋這個成員的繼承鏈結以尋找屬性；否則為 。

span.span: to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes; otherwise, .

param.span: 這個參數會忽略屬性和事件。

span.span: This parameter is ignored for properties and events.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回套用至此成員之所有自訂屬性的陣列。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an array of all custom attributes applied to this member.

returns.span: 包含套用至此成員之所有自訂屬性的陣列，如果沒有定義屬性，則為包含零個元素的陣列。

span.span: An array that contains all the custom attributes applied to this member, or an array with zero elements if no attributes are defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會忽略`inherit`屬性和事件的參數。This method ignores the `inherit` parameter for properties and events. 若要搜尋的屬性和事件屬性的繼承鏈結，使用的適當多載方法。To search the inheritance chain for attributes on properties and events, use the appropriate overloads of the method. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，這個方法會傳回安全性屬性的方法、 建構函式和型別上如果它們儲存在新的中繼資料格式。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns security attributes on methods, constructors, and types if they are stored in the new metadata format. 使用版本 2.0 所編譯的組件會使用此格式。Assemblies compiled with version 2.0 use this format. 動態組件和舊版的.NET Framework 編譯的組件使用舊的 XML 格式。Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format. 請參閱[發出的宣告式安全性屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5)。See [Emitting Declarative Security Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5). ## Examples 下列範例定義的自訂屬性，並將相關聯的屬性`MyClass.MyMethod`、 擷取該屬性在執行階段，並顯示結果。The following example defines a custom attribute and associates the attribute with `MyClass.MyMethod`, retrieves the attribute at run time, and displays the result. [!code-cpp[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1/CPP/memberinfo_getcustomattributes1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1/CS/memberinfo_getcustomattributes1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1/VB/memberinfo_getcustomattributes1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 這個成員所屬的型別已載入僅限反映的內容中。

span.span: See [How to: Load Assemblies into the Reflection-Only Context](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-load-assemblies-into-the-reflection-only-context.md).

exception.span: 無法載入自訂屬性型別。

span.span: A custom attribute type could not be loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會忽略`inherit`屬性和事件的參數。This method ignores the `inherit` parameter for properties and events. 若要搜尋的屬性和事件屬性的繼承鏈結，使用的適當多載方法。To search the inheritance chain for attributes on properties and events, use the appropriate overloads of the method. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，這個方法會傳回安全性屬性的方法、 建構函式和型別上如果屬性儲存在新的中繼資料格式。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns security attributes on methods, constructors, and types if the attributes are stored in the new metadata format. 使用版本 2.0 所編譯的組件會使用此格式。Assemblies compiled with version 2.0 use this format. 動態組件和舊版的.NET Framework 編譯的組件使用舊的 XML 格式。Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format. 請參閱[發出的宣告式安全性屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5)。See [Emitting Declarative Security Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5). ## Examples 下列範例會定義名為的類別`BaseClass`，有兩個非繼承的成員： 一個名為執行緒靜態欄位`total`和不符合 CLS 標準的方法，名為`MethodA`。The following example defines a class named `BaseClass` that has two non-inherited members: a thread static field named `total` and a non-CLS-compliant method named `MethodA`. 類別，名為`DerivedClass`繼承自`BaseClass`，並覆寫其`MethodA`方法。A class named `DerivedClass` inherits from `BaseClass` and overrides its `MethodA` method. 請注意，沒有屬性會套用到成員`DerivedClass`。Note that no attributes are applied to the members of `DerivedClass`. 此範例會逐一查看的成員清單`DerivedClass`來判斷是否或屬性已套用至它們。The example iterates the members of `DerivedClass` to determine whether the or attribute as been applied to them. 因為`inherit`已`true`，該方法會搜尋的繼承階層`DerivedClass`指定的屬性。Because `inherit` is `true`, the method searches the inheritance hierarchy of `DerivedClass` for the specified attribute. 做為範例所示，從輸出`total`欄位以裝飾屬性，而`MethodA`方法以裝飾屬性。As the output from the example shows, the `total` field is decorated with the attribute, and the `MethodA` method is decorated with the attribute. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes/cs/GetCustomAttributes1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes/vb/GetCustomAttributes1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 傳回 物件的清單，表示已套用至目標成員之屬性的資料。

span.span: Returns a list of objects representing data about the attributes that have been applied to the target member.

returns.span: 物件的泛型清單，表示已套用至目標成員之屬性的相關資料。

span.span: A generic list of objects representing data about the attributes that have been applied to the target member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要檢查的自訂屬性中僅限反映的內容，在其中已載入至僅限反映內容的程式碼中定義的自訂屬性本身的情況下的程式碼中使用這個方法。Use this method to examine the custom attributes of code in the reflection-only context, in cases where the custom attributes themselves are defined in code that is loaded into the reflection-only context. 等方法和不能在這種情況下，因為它們會產生屬性的執行個體。Methods like and cannot be used in such cases, because they create instances of the attributes. 無法執行僅限反映內容中的程式碼。Code in the reflection-only context cannot be executed. 如需詳細資訊和例如程式碼，請參閱類別。For more information and for example code, see the class. 此方法取得自訂屬性資料類型、 巢狀的類型和類型成員，因為類別和中的類別命名空間代表類型成員都是衍生自。This method gets custom attribute data for types, nested types, and type members, because the class and the classes in the namespace that represent type members all derive from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會忽略`inherit`屬性和事件的參數。This method ignores the `inherit` parameter for properties and events. 若要搜尋的屬性和事件屬性的繼承鏈結，使用的適當多載方法。To search the inheritance chain for attributes on properties and events, use the appropriate overloads of the method. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，這個方法會傳回`true`類型、 方法或建構函式是否儲存在新的中繼資料格式的安全性屬性。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns `true` if a type, method, or constructor has security attributes stored in the new metadata format. 使用版本 2.0 所編譯的組件會使用此格式。Assemblies compiled with version 2.0 use this format. 動態組件和舊版的.NET Framework 編譯的組件使用舊的 XML 格式。Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format. 請參閱[發出的宣告式安全性屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5)。See [Emitting Declarative Security Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5). ## Examples 下列範例會判斷是否要將指定的屬性套用至指定的成員。The following example determines whether the specified attribute is applied to the specified member. [!code-cpp[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/CPP/memberinfo_getcustomattribute_isdefined.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/CS/memberinfo_getcustomattribute_isdefined.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/VB/memberinfo_getcustomattribute_isdefined.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得 值，指出成員類型︰方法、建構函式、事件等。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating the type of the member — method, constructor, event, and so on.
A value indicating the type of member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別中覆寫這個屬性，並覆寫會傳回適當的成員類型。This property is overridden in derived classes, and the override returns the appropriate member type. 因此，當您檢查一組物件，例如，將所傳回的陣列—屬性可用來判斷任何特定成員的成員類型。Therefore, when you examine a set of objects — for example, the array returned by — the property can be used to determine the member type of any given member. 若要取得`MemberType`屬性，可獲得優質。To get the `MemberType` property, get the class . 從`Type`，取得陣列。From the `Type`, get the array. 從`MethodInfo`陣列中，取得`MemberTypes`。From the `MethodInfo` array, get the `MemberTypes`. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示指定之類別的型別與成員名稱。The following example displays the member name and type of a specified class. [!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int MetadataToken { get; }
.property instance int32 MetadataToken
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property MetadataToken As Integer
public: virtual property int MetadataToken { int get(); };
member this.MetadataToken : int

summary.span: 取得值，這個值可識別中繼資料項目。

span.span: Gets a value that identifies a metadata element.

value.span: 將此值與 相結合，即可唯一識別中繼資料項目。

span.span: A value which, in combination with , uniquely identifies a metadata element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性取得的權杖可以傳遞至 unmanaged 反映 API。The tokens obtained using this property can be passed to the unmanaged reflection API. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Unmanaged 反映 API](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8)。For more information, please see [Unmanaged Reflection API](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8). > [!NOTE] > 使用 unmanaged 的反映 API 需要熟悉的 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，特別是"Partition II:: 中繼資料定義和語意"和"Partition III: CIL 指令集 」。Using the unmanaged reflection API requires familiarity with the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

exception.span: 目前的 在其項目類型為尚未完成之動態類型的陣列類型上代表陣列方法 (例如 )。

span.span: The current represents an array method, such as , on an array type whose element type is a dynamic type that has not been completed.

exception.span: 若要在此情況下取得中繼資料權杖，請將 物件傳遞給 方法；或使用 方法直接取得權杖，而不是先使用 方法來取得 。

span.span: To get a metadata token in this case, pass the object to the method; or use the method to get the token directly, instead of using the method to get a first.

summary.span: 取得用於定義型別的模組，該型別宣告以目前 表示的成員。

span.span: Gets the module in which the type that declares the member represented by the current is defined.

value.span: 用於定義型別的 ，該型別宣告以目前 表示的成員。

span.span: The in which the type that declares the member represented by the current is defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了方便起見提供這個屬性。This property is provided as a convenience. 它相當於使用屬性，以取得在宣告方法，其類型，然後呼叫屬性產生物件。It is equivalent to using the property to get the type in which the method is declared, and then calling the property of the resulting object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會宣告繼承的類別且會覆寫。The following code example declares a class that inherits and overrides . 此範例會取得類別的物件`ToString`方法及繼承方法，並顯示在宣告的兩個方法之模組的名稱。The example obtains objects for the class's `ToString` method and for the inherited method, and displays the names of the modules in which the two methods are declared. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This method is not implemented.

public: abstract property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.Name : string

summary.span: 取得目前成員的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the current member.
A containing the name of this member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成員的簡單名稱會傳回，不是完整的名稱。Only the simple name of the member is returned, not the fully qualified name. 若要取得屬性，可獲得優質。To get the property, get the class . 從`Type`，取得陣列。From the `Type`, get the array. 從`MemberInfo`陣列中的項目取得`Name`屬性。From a `MemberInfo` element of the array, obtain the `Name` property. ## Examples 此範例會列出`Name`和`DeclaringType`指定類別的每個成員的屬性。This example lists the `Name` and `DeclaringType` property of each member of the specified class. [!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.Name Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.Name Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.Name Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得類別物件，是用來取得這個 的執行個體。

span.span: Gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance of .

value.span: 物件，用來取得這個 物件。

span.span: The object through which this object was obtained.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReflectedType`屬性會擷取物件，用來取得這個執行個體`MemberInfo`。The `ReflectedType` property retrieves the object that was used to obtain this instance of `MemberInfo`. 這可能與不同的值屬性，如果這個物件都代表繼承自基底類別的成員。This may differ from the value of the property if this object represents a member that is inherited from a base class. 如果`MemberInfo`物件是通用的成員 (亦即，如果它取自方法，以傳回模組上的全域方法)，傳回會`null`。If the `MemberInfo` object is a global member (that is, if it was obtained from the method, which returns global methods on a module), the returned will be `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何時變更成員檢視從取自型別進出取自類別本身，則是繼承 ，但不會覆寫。The following code example shows how the changes when the member is viewed from a obtained from type and from a obtained from the class itself, which inherits but does not override . [!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是用於存取 managed 類別，並不會呼叫從 managed 程式碼。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需詳細資訊`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.

span.span: The method is called late-bound using the COM IDispatch interface.
